info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards

Class Badge

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards.Reward
      • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards.PermanentReward
        • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards.Badge

  • @Entity
public class Badge
extends PermanentReward
    The badge class serves as a Reward-subclass that represents a distinct icon. It should be used as a an instantly recognizable visual reference to an badge a player was able to reach. A badge is a permanent reward, so a player can award a specific badge only once.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Badge() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addReward(Player player, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      With this method the player awards an badge if she/he hasn't awarded it, yet.
      void addReward(PlayerGroup group, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      With this method a group awards an badge and adds it to the list with permanent rewards, but only if this badge isn't already in the list of permanent rewards.
      URL getIcon()
      Gets the URL of the badge's icon, when it was created.
      byte[] getImageIcon()
      Gets the badge's icon as byte[].
      void setIcon(URL icon)
      Sets the URL value of the badge's icon, when it was created.
      void setImageIcon(byte[] icon)
      Sets the byte[] as an icon of a badge that is stored in the database.

      • getIcon

        public URL getIcon()
        Gets the URL of the badge's icon, when it was created.
        Returns:
        The URL of the associated icon.

      • setIcon

        public void setIcon(URL icon)
        Sets the URL value of the badge's icon, when it was created.
        Parameters:
        icon - The URL of the associated icon.

      • getImageIcon

        public byte[] getImageIcon()
        Gets the badge's icon as byte[].
        Returns:
        Byte[] of the badge's icon that is stored in the database.

      • setImageIcon

        public void setImageIcon(byte[] icon)
        Sets the byte[] as an icon of a badge that is stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        icon - The icon that should be connected with the badge as byte[].

      • addReward

        public void addReward(Player player,
                      GoalDAO goalDao,
                      RuleDAO ruleDao)
        With this method the player awards an badge if she/he hasn't awarded it, yet. Therefore the badge is added to her/his list of permanent rewards.
        Specified by:
        addReward in class Reward
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should award the badge. This parameter must not be null.
        goalDao - The goal DAO is required to access created goals.
        ruleDao - The rule DAO is required to access the created rules.

      • addReward

        public void addReward(PlayerGroup group,
                      GoalDAO goalDao,
                      RuleDAO ruleDao)
        With this method a group awards an badge and adds it to the list with permanent rewards, but only if this badge isn't already in the list of permanent rewards.
        Specified by:
        addReward in class Reward
        Parameters:
        group - The group of players which should award the badge. This parameter must not be null.
        goalDao - The goal DAO is required to access created goals.
        ruleDao - The rule DAO is required to access the created rules.
